name: Immortals
summary:
《Immortals》 is a SLG with fast paced fighting. 
When the game starts, the hero will appear in a huge maze, and your goal is to find a way out of the maze. 
The hero will encounter other characters in the maze. They may be enemies or friends. You need to be careful in making judgments. 
You need to collect materials, make magic weapons, learn skills and fight in this maze to find a way out of the maze.
